@1@ Constructs an object of type {{tt|std::counting_semaphore}} with the internal counter initialized to {{c|desired}}.

@2@ Copy constructor is deleted.

===Preconditions===
@1@ Both {{c|1=desired &gt;= 0}} and {{c|1=desired &lt;= max()}} are {{c|true}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|desired|the value to initialize {{tt|counting_semaphore}}'s counter with}}
{{par end}}

===Exceptions===
Throws nothing.
